\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w she|strong="H8193"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w she|strong="H8193"\w* \w got|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w papyrus|strong="H1573"\w* \w basket|strong="H8392"\w* \w and|strong="H3947"\w* coated \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w tar|strong="H2564"\w* \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w pitch|strong="H2203"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w she|strong="H8193"\w* \w placed|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w basket|strong="H8392"\w* \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w reeds|strong="H5488"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* sister \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w distance|strong="H7350"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w happen|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*.

Soon \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w bathe|strong="H7364"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Nile|strong="H2975"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* attendants \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* riverbank. \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w basket|strong="H8392"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w reeds|strong="H5488"\w*, \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* maidservant \w to|strong="H1980"\w* retrieve \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* little \w boy|strong="H5288"\w* \w was|strong="H5288"\w* \w crying|strong="H1058"\w*. \w So|strong="H2088"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H2550"\w* \w compassion|strong="H2550"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* said, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H7121"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* sister \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, “\w Shall|strong="H1323"\w* \w I|strong="H4480"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*?”

“\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* ahead,” \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* told \w her|strong="H7121"\w*. \w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w girl|strong="H1323"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w boy|strong="H3206"\w*’s mother.

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w wages|strong="H7939"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w woman|strong="H1323"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w boy|strong="H3206"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w nursed|strong="H3243"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w grown|strong="H1431"\w* older, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w brought|strong="H4872"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H7121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. \w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* explained, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w drew|strong="H4871"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.”

\w One|strong="H1961"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w grown|strong="H1431"\w* \w up|strong="H1431"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w observed|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w hard|strong="H5450"\w* \w labor|strong="H5450"\w*. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w beating|strong="H5221"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w*, \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w After|strong="H3588"\w* \w looking|strong="H6437"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w way|strong="H3541"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* body \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sand|strong="H2344"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5221"\w* \w next|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w Moses|strong="H3318"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* \w fighting|strong="H5327"\w*. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7563"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w attacking|strong="H5221"\w* \w your|strong="H3318"\w* \w companion|strong="H7453"\w*?”

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* replied, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w ruler|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*? \w Are|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* planning \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*?” \w Then|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w thought|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w done|strong="H7760"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w surely|strong="H2026"\w* \w become|strong="H3372"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*. \w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* well.

Now \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w had|strong="H3548"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w they|strong="H3548"\w* \w came|strong="H1323"\w* \w to|strong="H1323"\w* \w draw|strong="H1802"\w* \w water|strong="H8248"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w troughs|strong="H7298"\w* \w to|strong="H1323"\w* \w water|strong="H8248"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* father’s \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H4872"\w* some \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w came|strong="H4872"\w* \w along|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w drove|strong="H1644"\w* \w them|strong="H1644"\w* \w away|strong="H1644"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w help|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H1644"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w watered|strong="H8248"\w* \w their|strong="H8248"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* daughters returned \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* father \w Reuel|strong="H7467"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* asked \w them|strong="H3117"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* returned \w so|strong="H4116"\w* early \w today|strong="H3117"\w*?”

“\w An|strong="H1571"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w* \w rescued|strong="H5337"\w* \w us|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*,” \w they|strong="H1571"\w* replied. “\w He|strong="H3027"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w drew|strong="H1802"\w* \w water|strong="H8248"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H5337"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w watered|strong="H8248"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.”

“\w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H7121"\w*?” \w their|strong="H5800"\w* father \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w behind|strong="H5800"\w*? \w Invite|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w have|strong="H1323"\w* \w something|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w*.”

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w agreed|strong="H2974"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* man, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w Zipporah|strong="H6855"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* marriage.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H8034"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w Gershom|strong="H1647"\w*, saying, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H5237"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreign|strong="H5237"\w* land.”

\w After|strong="H4480"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. \w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* groaned \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w under|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* burden \w of|strong="H1121"\w* slavery, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w for|strong="H4714"\w* deliverance \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5656"\w* \w ascended|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* God.

\w So|strong="H8085"\w* God \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w groaning|strong="H5009"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w He|strong="H3290"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w His|strong="H8085"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* Abraham, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.
God \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H3478"\w* \w notice|strong="H3045"\w*.
